#summary Omnima Package install

= Introduction =

basic built for Linux. See Linux wiki for details. Can connect of serial to DCMP firmware. Default attempts to connect to RBC unit running DCMP firmware on /dev/ttyS1. 

= Installation =

{{{
opkg install http://robobuilderlib.googlecode.com/files/rbasic_452.7-1_ramips.ipk
}}}

= Run =

{{{
rbasic
}}}
